Class DocumentIdentityMap

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
      org.apache.lenya.transaction.IdentityMapImpl
          org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentIdentityMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
IdentityMap, org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled
public class DocumentIdentityMap
extends IdentityMapImpl

A DocumentIdentityMap avoids the multiple instanciation of a document object.

Version:
$Id: DocumentIdentityMap.java 179568 2005-06-02 09:27:26Z jwkaltz $
